Title: Exploring Clang/LLVM optimization on programming horror
Description: Recently, I've come across a not so efficient implementation of a isEven function (from r/programminghorror).

Title: Asking nicely for root command execution (and getting it)
Description:
There was a SEV review meeting once upon a time, and in it, we had 
reviewed some incident where something bad happened involving something 
that ran as root.  I don't remember the finer points of that one any 
more, but the resident VP who ran the show wondered aloud how much 
"root exposure" we had in our infra in general.  That got my attention.

Title: More. Helvetica. Now.
Description: Helvetica Now Variable gives you over a million new Helvetica styles in one state-of-the-art font file (over two-and-a-half million with italics!). Use it as an extension of the Helvetica Now family or make custom-blends from its weights (Hairline to ExtraBlack), optical sizes (four point to infinity), and new Compressed and Condensed widths.
